name: Ticking Speed
description:
This is not a finished game.

This is a fast-paced 3D time bound driving game with ambiance that gives you the chills. Seriously.

This was made as a collaboration between Kshitij Kulkarni and Rahim Mammadzada as an entry for the Kommunity Open Jam 2021.

You can join our discord server to talk game dev, 3D design, or simply make friends. https://discord.gg/wbr3z79G
